# Changelog

All notable changes to `AfricasTalking notification channel` will be documented in this file

## 3.2.0 - 2022-02-09

## What's Changed

- Laravel 9 support

## 3.1.0 - 2021-09-24

## What's Changed

- Fix invalid sender issues

## 2.2.0 - 2020-10-30

## What's Changed

- Add PHP 8 support

## 1.0.0 - 2020-03-17

## What's Changed

- fixed issue with dependency injection

## 0.0.1 - 2020-03-16

## What's Changed

- initial release
